item.title: Commander Bot Beta
item.description: Beta Release This Beta Version is the first public test of the bot.

item.title: Commander Multi-Bot
item.description: This is an OpenSource Project available on Github: The CommanderBot is a Multi-Token Discord Bot. This can be used to split intensive operations, or API limited opperations like the “User Voice Channel Move” opperation (limited by the API). Is is capable of using N “Servant” Bot connections to perform fast mass “User Move” operations, and the request will be executed by the ammount of bots connected to the server.
